law.full_text:
PENALTIES. (Added by Ord. No. 171,761, Eff. 11/30/97.)
Any landlord who does not complete a City-approved property management training program within 60 days from the date the landlord is ordered to complete the program as required in Section 154.02 above, shall be guilty of an infraction. Notwithstanding any provision of this Code to the contrary, such infraction is punishable by a fine of $250.00.

unit.catch_line: Duties Of The Los Angeles Housing Department.

next_section.catch_line: Duties Of The Los Angeles Housing Department.

law.plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE
PENALTIES. (§ 154.03)
PENALTIES. (Added by Ord. No. 171,761, Eff. 11/30/97.) Any landlord who does not complete a City-approved property management training program within 60 days from the date the landlord is ordered to complete the program as required in Section 154.02 above, shall be guilty of an infraction. Notwithstanding any provision of this Code to the contrary, such infraction is punishable by a fine of $250.00.
